actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide certain persons insured under servicemen's group life insurance (SGLI) with the choice of conversion either to an individual policy or veterans' group life insurance (VGLI) upon expiration of their SGLI coverage.

summary.text: Authorizes qualified persons insured under Servicemen's Group Life Insurance with the choice of conversion either to an individual policy or Veterans' Group Life Insurance upon expiration of their Servicemen's Group Life Insurance coverage. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 768).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide certain persons insured under servicemen's group life insurance (SGLI) with the choice of conversion either to an individual policy or veterans' group life insurance (VGLI) upon expiration of their SGLI coverage.
